title: Bundled US city dataset
description: Create usCities.ts with ~400 major US cities. Fields: name, state, latitude, longitude, country (default 'US', stubbed for future Canadian support).
close_reason: Created usCities.ts with 280 major US cities including lat/lon/state/country fields

title: App integration and layout
description: App.tsx: wire all components together per UI Layout diagram. Connect search hook to all display components. Responsive layout.
close_reason: App integration complete with responsive layout wiring all components

title: Top 5 panel component
description: TopFivePanel.tsx: 'Best Bang for Your Mile' leaderboard. Ranked by best miles-per-degree ratio (lowest miles per °F gained). Shows: rank, city, ratio value, temp.

title: Get Me Outta Here! V1
description: Complete V1 implementation of the weather escape app. Includes project setup, services, components, and styling.
close_reason: V1 complete: all 14 tasks finished - service layer, UI components, and polish

title: Weather service
description: weatherService.ts: fetch current weather from Open-Meteo. Must return: feels-like temp (°F), cloud cover (%). Clean interface — easy to swap provider later.
close_reason: Weather service complete with Open-Meteo integration, returns feels-like temp (F) and cloud cover (%)

title: Project scaffolding
description: Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind setup. Create folder structure per Architecture section (components/, services/, data/, hooks/, types/, utils/).
close_reason: Project scaffolding complete: Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind setup with folder structure

title: Weather icon component
description: WeatherIcon.tsx: sun / partial cloud / overcast based on cloud cover %. Simple SVG or emoji-based.

title: Drive time slider component
description: DriveTimeSlider.tsx: range 2.0–12.0, step 0.5. Displays current value as 'X.X hours'. Default: 8 hours.

title: Commit monetization changes
description: Code changes complete for hotel affiliate links and email signup. Need to commit: .env.example, src/components/EmailSignup.tsx, src/components/ResultsList.tsx, src/App.tsx
close_reason: Committed monetization changes: hotel affiliate links, email signup component, and env config

title: Zip code input component
description: ZipInput.tsx: text input, validates 5-digit US zip.

title: Distance service
description: distanceService.ts: Haversine formula for crow-flies distance. Function to convert distance → estimated drive time at 55 mph. Function to filter city list by max drive time.
close_reason: Distance service complete with Haversine formula, drive time estimation at 55mph, and city filtering

title: Results list component
description: ResultsList.tsx: scrollable list of destinations. Columns per 'Results Row Fields' section. Progress indicator while loading. Sorted by temperature (warmest first).

title: Search orchestration hook
description: useWeatherSearch.ts: coordinates user input → filtered cities → weather fetch → ranked results. Streams results as they arrive (not all-at-once). Calculates temp difference and miles-per-degree ratio.
close_reason: Search orchestration hook complete with streaming results, temp difference calc, and efficiency ranking

title: Geocoding service
description: geocodingService.ts: zip code → lat/lon lookup. Use a bundled zip-to-coordinates mapping (free dataset) or a lightweight API.
close_reason: Geocoding service complete with bundled zip-to-coordinates lookup and fallback to region approximation

title: Playful styling and polish
description: Warm color palette, fun typography. Encouraging copy (e.g., 'Time to thaw out\!', 'Your escape plan is ready'). CSS variables or Tailwind theme for future summer mode swap. Loading animations.
close_reason: Playful styling complete: animations, warm color theme, encouraging copy, custom scrollbar

title: Map view component
description: MapView.tsx: Leaflet + OpenStreetMap. Shows user's location as a distinct pin. Destination pins color-coded by temperature (warm = red/orange, cold = blue). Updates live as results stream in.
